issue.title: Use absolute namespace in macros
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-299](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-299). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As macros can be embedded anywhere, the namespaces in there should be explicitly absolute.
